name: Andrew Cross
overview:
CEO of GooseChase. Hustler and UX Design. Mobile positions at Apple and Polar Mobile, BASc Engineering at University of Waterloo.Giving in to my travel obsession with Tripzaar, a peer-to-peer online marketplace for trips. You pick a place and what you want to do there. We show you customizable packages created by local experts.
Specialties: mobile app design, hardware design, entrepreneurship, front-end dev, graphic design
